The short: It's garbage.

The long:
Blizzard took a truly incredible game and said "Okay, but; hear me out: What if it were removed core features, sold previously free items for $19, and pushed it as a "new experience" and then slowly re-add said features, advertising them as new?". I'm certain whoever game up with this idea was given a very handsome raise, funded off of the obnoxiously expensive cosmetic shop (and heroes too, of course. What? You thought the team based shooter would given you the tools to win?)

Of course, I could somewhat excuse this. As someone who already had everything I wanted, this only bothered me somewhat. And somewhere deep down, I thought it'd get better. Spoiler, it didn't.

As of August the 10th, 2023, Overwatch 2 has officially stooped so low as to sell 3 bloody missions for 15 euros. 15 fucking euros for what? 2 hours of content? Given the promise of hundreds of replayable story missions for $40, I'd say that's quite the fucking downgrade. And as if that wasn't bad enough, they're boring as fuck. Because why a make new, genuinely enjoyable game when you can reuse the ones you designed for your PvP experience and add some shitty bots? That'd just be a waste of money, eh?

Honestly, I'd've preferred had Blizzard just spat in my face. At least then they'd've given us something, albeit some fizzy fucking saliva. I'm honestly ashamed to have believed they'd deliver on their promises. Overwatch 2 just goes to show you can't expect anything from AAA studios anymore, as if other recent releases hadn't already shown it plenty.

Just buy Deep Rock Galactic. At least then you get actual replayable missions.

Not too long ago, you could earn 3 free decent seasonal skins by playing and winning a handful of games. These skins came alongside meaningful new gameplay modes and generally adequate matchmaking.
Now to earn any new skins, players need to grind for months, fulfilling periodic quests that reward you with in-game pennies.
Never seen a playerbase betrayed so thoroughly.

Hey guys, did you know that in terms of male human and female Omnic breeding, Orisa is the most compatible Omnic for humans? Not only she is in the mecha-horse group, which is close to mammals, Orisa is 7'4" tall and +300 pounds, this means she's large enough to be able to handle human d*cks, and with her impressive Base Stats for HP and access to Fortify Skill, you can be rough with her. Due to her mostly lubricant based construction, there's no doubt in my mind that an aroused Orisa would be incredibly slippery, so slippery that you could easily have s*x with one for hours without getting sore. She also has skills like Energy Javelin, Javelin Spin and Terra Surge, along with not having armor coat to hide n*pples, so it'd be incredibly easy for her to get you in the mood. With her being mecha-horse with lots of overheating parts, like her Fusion Driver, she can easily recover from high heat with enough coolant. No other Omnic comes close to this level of compatibility. Also, fun fact, if you pull out enough, you can make Orisa turn white, at least her abdomen. Orisa is literally built for human d*ck. Ungodly defense stat + high HP pool + Fortify means she can take c*ck all day, all shapes and sizes and still come for more.
